# List filters
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add (A) Alpha +work @office
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add Bravo +home @phone
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add (B) Charlie +work @home
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add Delta +misc
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite done 2

# Default list (todo only)
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list
stdout 'Alpha'
stdout 'Charlie'
stdout 'Delta'
! stdout 'Bravo'

# Done only
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --done
stdout 'Bravo'
! stdout 'Alpha'

# All
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --all
stdout 'Alpha'
stdout 'Bravo'
stdout 'Charlie'
stdout 'Delta'

# Project filter
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --project work
stdout 'Alpha'
stdout 'Charlie'
! stdout 'Bravo'
! stdout 'Delta'

# Context filter
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --context home
stdout 'Charlie'
! stdout 'Alpha'

# Priority filter
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --priority A
stdout 'Alpha'
! stdout 'Charlie'

# Search filter
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --all --search phone
stdout 'Bravo'
! stdout 'Alpha'
